Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Join us <https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/9573/155785?utm_partnersource=Pivotal> for this webinar and discover how to use the power of Pivotal HAWQ to enable true ANSI SQL queries on Hortonworks Data Platform.
Based on the Open Data Platform <http://opendataplatform.org/> initiative, where Pivotal and Hortonworks along with other big data visionaries, partnered to create a common commercial core of Apache HadoopÂ® projects, we announced that Pivotal HAWQ, the SQL on Hadoop query engine that speeds up big data queries by up to 1000x, is now available on Hortonworks Data Platform.
In this webinar you'll learn how Pivotal HAWQ, coupled with the Hortonworks Data Platform can turbocharge your Data Science efforts. Used together, Pivotal HAWQ and the Hortonworks Data Platform provide businesses with a Modern Data Architecture <http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> for Digital Transformation.
